column1: The Federal Reserve Board on Thursday released the minutes of its discount rate meetings from December 15, 2003, through January 26, 2004.The minutes are attached.Attachment (68 KB PDF) 2004 Monetary policy Home | News and events Accessibility Last update: March 25, 2004
